question: Rani Lakshmi Bai Central Agricultural University, that was seen in news recently, is located in which state?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the College and Administration Buildings of Rani Lakshmi Bai Central Agricultural University virtually.
The RLB Central Agriculture University is located in Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh. While the first academic course was started in the year 2014-15, it is operating from the Indian Grassland and Fodder Research Institute, Jhansi.
